citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:40 PM on 11
October 2022. Inspector called licensee to announce arrival. Licensee stated that they were heading out to an
appointment and were unable to perform an inspection today.
End Section

narrative:
